Package model

Class Capsule

java.lang.Object
model.Capsule
public class Capsule extends Object
This class represents a capsule, which is a small piece of content that can be shared on a platform. It contains information about its id, the situation in which it was created, its type, its author, the position of the author, the lesson that it represents, its hashtags, whether it has been approved and published, and its unique URL.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Constructs a Capsule object with a randomly generated id, a given situation, type, author, position of the author, and lesson.

  • Constructor Details

    • Capsule

      public Capsule(String situation, int typeCapsule, String authorCapsule, String positionAuthor, String lessonCapsule)
      Constructs a Capsule object with a randomly generated id, a given situation, type, author, position of the author, and lesson. Initializes its hashtags, approval status, publishing status, and unique URL.
      Parameters:
      situation - a String representing the situation in which the Capsule was created
      typeCapsule - an int representing the type of the Capsule
      authorCapsule - a String representing the author of the Capsule
      positionAuthor - a String representing the position of the author of the Capsule
      lessonCapsule - a String representing the lesson that the Capsule represents

  • Method Details

    • startBasicHashtag

      public void startBasicHashtag()
      Initializes the hashtags array to an empty String for all elements.

    • obteinHashtagsLesson

      public void obteinHashtagsLesson(String lesson)
      Extracts hashtags from the lesson parameter using a regular expression pattern. Updates the hashtags array with the found hashtags.
      Parameters:
      lesson - a String representing the lesson to extract hashtags from

    • obteinHashtagsSituation

      public void obteinHashtagsSituation(String situation)
      Extracts hashtags from the situation parameter using a regular expression pattern. Updates the hashtags array with the found hashtags.
      Parameters:
      situation - a String representing the situation to extract hashtags from
